cab.content: Military Secret.99717* 19564. 15th July, No. 65, Part I.-Nil.Part II. 1. Aeroplane 6 miles west of Banna on Miranshali road was attacked noon (by) tribesmen yesterday. Attack was repulsed and hangar and averts undamaged. We lost two killed, live wounded.2. Lakahand Camp attacked yesterday morning, but enemy withdrew before dawn and were followed up. We lost one killed, two wounded.Communicated to Press.
